name: Aquila Favonia
effect: Increases ATK by 20%. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by 40% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

name: Skyward Blade
effect: CRIT Rate increased by 4%. Gains Skypiercing Might upon using an Elemental Burst: Increases Movement SPD by 10%, increases ATK SPD by 10%, and increases the DMG of Normal and Charged Attack hits by 20% for 12s.

name: Primordial Jade Cutter
effect: HP increased by 20%. Additionally, provides an ATK Bonus based on 1.2% of the wielder's Max HP.

name: Summit Shaper
effect: Increases Shield Strength by 20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

name: The Black Sword
effect: Increases DMG dealt by Normal and Charged Attacks by 20%. Additionally, regenerates 60% of ATK as HP when Normal and Charged Attacks score a CRIT Hit. This effect can occur once every 5s.

name: Prototype Rancour
effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 4% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.3s.

name: Lion's Roar
effect: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Pyro or Electro by 20%.

name: The Alley Flash
effect: Increases DMG dealt by the character equipping this weapon by 12%. Taking DMG disables this effect for 5s.

name: Favonius Sword
effect: CRIT hits have a 60% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

name: Royal Longsword
effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.

name: Sacrificial Sword
effect: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.

name: Iron Sting
effect: Dealing Elemental DMG increases all DMG by 6% for 6s. Max 2 stacks. Can only occur once every 1s.

name: The Flute
effect: Normal or Charged Attacks grant a Harmonic on hits. Gaining 5 Harmonics triggers the power of music and deals 100% ATK DMG to surrounding enemies. Harmonics last up to 30s, and a maximum of 1 can be gained every 0.5s.

name: Sword of Descension
effect: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 6% more DMG and take 3% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

name: Lithic Spear
effect: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains 7% ATK increase and 3% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

name: Blackcliff Pole
effect: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Royal Spear
effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.

name: Prototype Grudge
effect: After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 8% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

name: Favonius Lance
effect: CRIT hits have a 60% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

name: Deathmatch
effect: If there are at least 2 enemies nearby, ATK is increased by 16% and DEF is increased by 16%. If there are fewer than 2 enemies nearby, ATK is increased by 24%.

name: Halberd
effect: Normal Attacks deal an additional 160% DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: White Tassel
effect: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 24%.

name: Black Tassel
effect: Increases DMG against slimes by 40%.

name: Crescent Pike
effect: After picking up an Elemental Orb/Particle, Normal and Charged Attacks deal an additional 20% ATK DMG for 5s.

name: Blackcliff Pole
effect: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 6% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Wolf's Gravestone
effect: Increases ATK by 20%. On hit, attacks against enemies with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by 40% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

name: Skyward Pride
effect: Increases all DMG by 8%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that deals 80% of ATK as DMG to enemies along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

name: The Unforged
effect: Increases Shield Strength by 20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

name: Serpent Spine
effect: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 6% more DMG and take 3% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

name: The Bell
effect: Taking DMG generates a shield that absorbs DMG up to 20% of Max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every 45s.

name: Whiteblind
effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. This effect can only occur once every 0.5s.

name: Rainslasher
effect: Increases DMG against enemies affected by Hydro or Electro by 20%.

name: Lithic Blade
effect: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains 7% ATK increase and 3% CRIT Rate increase. This effect stacks up to 4 times.

name: Blackcliff Slasher
effect: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
effect: Hitting an enemy with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80% AoE ATK DMG. Enemies affected by Cryo are dealt 200% ATK DMG instead by the icicle. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Royal Greatsword
effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.

name: Sacrificial Greatsword
effect: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.

name: White Iron Greatsword
effect: Increases Shield Strength by 20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

name: Lost Prayer to the Sacred Winds
effect: Increases Movement SPD by 10%. When in battle, gain an 8% Elemental DMG Bonus every 4s. Max 4 stacks. Lasts until the character falls or leaves combat.

name: Skyward Atlas
effect: Increases Elemental DMG Bonus by 12%. Normal Attack hits have a 50% chance to earn the favor of the clouds. which actively seek out nearby enemies to attack for 15s, dealing 160% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 30s.

name: Memory of Dust
effect: Increases Shield Strength by 20%. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

name: Widsith
effect: When a character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by 60%. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 48%. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 240.

name: Eye of Perception
effect: Normal and Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to fire a Bolt of Perception, dealing 240% ATK as DMG. This bolt can bounce between enemies a maximum of 4 times. This effect can occur once every 12s.

name: Solar Pearl
effect: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 20% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 20% for 6s.

name: Frostbearer
effect: Hitting an enemy with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80% AoE ATK DMG. Enemies affected by Cryo are dealt 200% ATK DMG instead by the icicle. Can only occur once every 10s.

name: Mappa Mare
effect: Triggering an Elemental reaction grants a 8% Elemental DMG Bonus for 10s. Max 2 stacks.

name: The Widsith
effect: When a character takes the field, they will gain a random theme song for 10s. This can only occur once every 30s. Recitative: ATK is increased by 60%. Aria: Increases all Elemental DMG by 48%. Interlude: Elemental Mastery is increased by 240.

name: Prototype Amber
effect: Using an Elemental Burst regenerates 4 Energy every 2s for 6s. All party members will regenerate 4% HP every 2s for this duration.

name: Blackcliff Agate
effect: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Favonius Codex
effect: CRIT hits have a 60% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

name: Magic Guide
effect: Increases DMG against slimes by 40%.

name: Amos' Bow
effect: Increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 12%. After using an Elemental Skill, increases Normal and Charged Attack DMG by 8% for 12s. Max 2 stacks.

name: Skyward Harp
effect: Increases CRIT DMG by 20%. Hits have a 60% chance to inflict a small AoE attack, dealing 125% Physical ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 4s.

name: The Viridescent Hunt
effect: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding enemies, dealing 40% of ATK as DMG to these enemies every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 14s.

name: Prototype Crescent
effect: Charged Attack hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 36% for 10s.

name: The Stringless
effect: Increases Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 24%.

name: Royal Bow
effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.

name: Favonius Warbow
effect: CRIT hits have a 60% chance to generate 1 Elemental Orb, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

name: Rust
effect: Increases Normal Attack DMG by 40% but decreases Aimed Shot DMG by 10%.

name: Compound Bow
effect: Normal Attack and Aimed Shot hits increase ATK by 4% and Normal ATK SPD by 1.2% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s.

name: Blackcliff Warbow
effect: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

name: Prototype Crescent
effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 240% ATK DMG to enemies within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

name: Favonius Warbow
effect: CRIT hits have a 60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

name: Messenger
effect: Normal Attack hits increase Elemental Skill and Elemental Burst DMG by 20% for 6s. Likewise, Elemental Skill or Elemental Burst hits increase Normal Attack DMG by 20% for 6s.
